name: Into The Sky (itch)
description:
Use Your Special Ability To Jump Far To Any Direction You Like To Go Up An Endless Tree Of Platforms Into The Sky And Avoid The Lava Rising Below Your Very Feet!

You Can Also Collect Coins Along The Way And Use Them To Customize Your Appearance And make Yourself Look Super Cool With 9 Different Uniqe Skins! (The Skins Are Literally Just Colors But Whatever.)

Controls because I Forgot To Add A Tutorial:

A\Left Arrow And D\Right Arrow - Move Left And Right.

Move Mouse - Aim Jump Direction.

LMB - Jump In Aimed Direction.  Also Prevents You From Moving Until You Land Again And 0.25 Seconds Have Passed.
